attributes.action: Reinstate the free bus service to all children living in Girton and Oakington
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Local Council has decided to withdraw all free bus services to children who live less than 3 miles from IVC.  The route proposed for children to use has been supposedly assessed as safe to cycle or walk dispite there having been 53 accidents (2 Fatal involving bikes) in the last 6 years

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Reinstate the free bus service to all children living in Girton and Oakington."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15917.asp

Prime Minister's Office
